name: Meshitomo: FoodPals
description:
Meshitomo is a Tamagotchi-like mobile game that involves the player taking care of blob-like creatures that would evolve into ingredients - which you can then use to fuse into dishes that unlock photographs of a person's memory.

Features:

  • 5 friends to choose from!
  • Clean poop and earn money!
  • Buy plushies that can evolve your friends.
  • Keep your friend healthy and clean in order to grow after 24 hours!
  • A secret to unlock!

Creators:
Patrick Kayser - Programmer
Zeals Ng - Artist
